text: A pump-jet or water jet is a marine system that creates a jet of water for propulsion. The mechanical arrangement may be a propeller with nozzle, or a centrifugal pump and nozzle. Pump jets have some advantages over bare propellers for certain applications, usually related to requirements for high- speed. == Other websites == * Personal Watercraft Industry Association * American Watercraft Association * U.S. Coast Guard Boating Safety Category:Engineering
title: Pump-jet
